name: Rune and Gem Splitting
description: Simplifies rune and gem upgrade recipes. Add recipes to split runes and gems.
author: CelticHound

config.name: 2-Rune Upgrades
config.description: Modifies the rune upgrade recipes to require two of the lower rune and no gems.

config.name: Rune Splitting
config.description: Adds recipes for a single rune to split into two lower runes.

config.name: 2-Gem Upgrades
config.description: Modifies the gem upgrade recipes to require two of the lower gem.

config.name: Gem Splitting
config.description: Adds recipes for a single gem to split into two lower gems.

config.name: Gem Conversion
config.description: Adds recipes for a single gem plus a stamina potion to convert to a different gem of the same rank.

config.name: Require a thawing potion to split
config.description: The recipes to split a single rune or gem also require a thawing potion, for compatibility with StackableRunes and StackableGems.
